text: Bob Halloran (April 21, 1934 â€“ January 2, 2022) was an American sportscaster. He worked with CBS Sports. He was an executive with MGM Mirage. He would commentate on golf and boxing and sports events in Las Vegas. Halloran died at his home in Rancho Mirage, California on January 2, 2022, at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American sports commentators Category:Businesspeople from Massachusetts
title: Bob Halloran (CBS sportscaster)
